com.util

类 StringTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.util.StringTool

  • public class StringTool
extends java.lang.Object
    The tool class about byte array and String convert.

    • 方法详细资料

      • stringToByteArray

        public static byte[] stringToByteArray(java.lang.String strHexValue)
        Convert the hex string to byte array;
        参数:
        strHexValue - the hex string value.
        返回:
        byte[] the resolved value.

      • stringArrayToByteArray

        public static byte[] stringArrayToByteArray(java.lang.String[] strAryHex,
                                            int nLen)
        Convert the Hex string array to byte array
        参数:
        strAryHex - the hex string value.
        nLen - the needed parse length.
        返回:
        byte[] the resolved value.

      • byteArrayToString

        public static java.lang.String byteArrayToString(byte[] btAryHex,
                                                 int nIndex,
                                                 int nLen)
        Convert the Hex string array to byte array
        参数:
        btAryHex - the hex string value.
        nIndex - the starting parse position.
        nLen - the needed parse length.
        返回:
        byte[] the resolved value.

      • stringToStringArray

        public static java.lang.String[] stringToStringArray(java.lang.String strValue,
                                                     int nLen)
        Convert the String to StringArray
        参数:
        strValue - the src string
        nLen - needed convert length
        返回:
        String[] the parsed value.

      • getChars

        @Deprecated
public static char[] getChars(byte[] bytes,
                                           java.lang.String encoding)
        已过时。 
        Convert the byte array to special encode char array.
        参数:
        bytes - the needed byte array.
        encoding - the encoding format.
        返回:
        char[] the converted char array.

      • toASCIIString

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.String toASCIIString(java.lang.String hexString)
        已过时。 
        resolve the bytes String data to ASCII.String like this "2f3Eab"
        参数:
        hexString - the needed parse data.
        返回:
        String the return value.

      • hexStringToASCIIString

        public static java.lang.String hexStringToASCIIString(java.lang.String hexString)
        Resolve the bytes String data to ASCII.String like this "2f3Eab"
        参数:
        hexString - the needed parse data.
        返回:
        String the return value.

      • subBytes

        public static byte[] subBytes(byte[] bytes,
                              int start,
                              int end)
        Get the sub bytes of the parent bytes;
        参数:
        bytes - parent bytes;
        start - start position;
        end - end position;
        返回:
        the child bytes;

      • subBytesContains

        public static int subBytesContains(byte[] parentBytes,
                                   byte[] childBytes,
                                   int startPosition)
        Get the child position in their parents string
        参数:
        parentBytes - parent bytes;
        childBytes - child bytes;
        startPosition - start scan position;
        返回:
        if -1 child not in parent string,or the child first position found in parent;

      • hexStringToBytes

        public static byte[] hexStringToBytes(java.lang.String hexString)
        Convert hexString to byte array.
        参数:
        hexString - to bytes
        返回:
        The converted byte array.

      • compareBytes

        public static boolean compareBytes(byte[] first,
                                   byte[] second)
        Compare the both byte array
        参数:
        first - the first byte array
        second - the second byte array
        返回:
        if true first equals second ,otherwise unequal

      • asciiStringToBytes

        public static byte[] asciiStringToBytes(java.lang.String string)
        Convert Ascii string to byte array.
        参数:
        string - the needed converter data.
        返回:
        byte[] the converted value.
